page.title: 13Clubs in Sedlescombe
page.content: As well as the Sports Clubs mentioned in the Recreation Page the village has an Afternoon Women's Institute, an Evening W.I., a Young Wives Group and a Mothers' Union. There are 3 meeting places for local clubs. Regular events in the{Village Hall} include Youth Club, Library, Whist Drives, Old Time Dancing, Concerts, Horticultural Shows, Committee Meetings, Discos, C. of E. Sunday Schools and Senior Citizens' Club. The{School Hall}is used for events such as Christmas Markets and Summer Fairs, Barn Dances and Discos, and School activities such as Concerts and Services for parents and children. Scouts, Cubs, Guides and Brownies all meet in the{Scout Hut.}Bingo is held here, as are family parties. The Sedlescombe Seniors meet in one of the Pubs and have guest speakers.
